info.author: Alexey Suda-Chen
info.description:
The SpriteCraft is small and lightweight x86/DirectX 2D game engine for
shareware/freeware game development. The engine distributed for free without any
fee. You may use SpriteCraft in wide range projects without any fake restrictions.
info.name: Sprite-Craft-2D-Engine
